content.detailedDescription: My wife was leaving for her 3rd shift job. i walked her out to the garage (about 10:35 pm). she walks to the passenger side to put her lunch bag and purse on the passenger seat. at this time i stepped out of the garage and was looking south. i saw a bright orange light. i first assumed it was the hospital helicopter heading to cleveland. but then i noticed it made zero sound. that helicopter flies over our house almost daily and it rattles our one cabinet, it is so loud. at this point i yell to my wife to come here now! it took her a few seconds to join me outside of the garage. as we watch this orange ball, i'd say it appeared the size of a pea, approach, two headlights (pinkish in color, and perfect triangles) lit in front of this thing. the headlights would suddenly go off, or on, or switch to other sides of the craft. always two perfect cones of light side by side. but the main craft remained lit orange in color continuously. it flew practically straight over heads, but slightly to the east. at this point, my wife says that she must go or she will be late. i watched this silent craft travel northward heading towards cleveland and lake erie. as i watched it got smaller to a pin point, i looked away for a second, to make sure i was out of the way of my wife's car backing out of the garage, and when i looked again, it was gone.
content.summary: Glowing orange ball with two moving spot lights

content.detailedDescription:
In november of 1971 i was 16, my father, aunt and cousin and i were coming from lake tahoe to the bay area on highway 50. i have large family and everyone at one time or another lived in lake tahoe and the bay area so in my life time i have traveled that route many many times. we left tahoe around 11 pm after my father got off work, we were in his vw van. it's a twisty 2 lane highway that starts hi up the mountain then levels out as you descend. this night we saw an unusual amount of animal activity. sometimes you might see a couple deer or a raccoon when they cross the highwy to get to the river. this night we saw more deer, squirrels, a couple of raccoons a couple owls, more than i ever saw in all my trips. we were all commenting on it, my dad said maybe there was a bear or mountain lion in the area that had them all spooked. as you get lower you have the river on one side and you're up against the mountain on the other side. then you eventually come to a section where the mountain is behind you and the highway is above and the landscape falls away on both sides into deep valleys. at that point the forest is below you. in those days and at that time of year there isn't hardly any people. there's cabins and campgrounds but at this time they are closed up for the winter so there' only a couple small communities that people live at all year but that is still 20 -30 miles farther down the highway, pollack pines, soda springs then placerville about 50 miles away. 
so we notice the animals first then when we're near where you're finally off the mountain going towards where the highway is above the valley and we can see a really bright light thru the trees. we come around the bend and see this huge super bright ball of light moving slowly over the valley coming our direction. it's still about 10 miles away but it's big, it has a beam of light coming from it like a spotlight shining down on the forest below. my dad pulls over and we all get out. my cousin was about 8 he was asleep until we pulled over. my aunt says don't say it's a ufo he'll be scared, she told him to get back in the van. my father and i walked across the highway to look at it better. there was a full moon that night and it was kind of overcast. this ball was below the clouds. the size was as if you held out at arms length in you fingers a dime in one hand and a 50 cent piece in the other, the moon was the dime. there was no noise at all. it had to be really big because it was still about 10 miles down from us and about 5 miles off to that side of the road. they didn't have helicopter cops in use in those days and there is no one around up there anyway. my father had served on an aircraft carrier and was saying that that wasn't anything humans would fly. i had never seen anything that bright, i didn't know about fluorescent lights then but it was brighter than any i've seen since. it was slowly moving across the valley with this beam lighting up the forest below. we watched it for about 5-10 minutes, then it stopped and about 10 seconds later the beam went off then it just shot away upwards and to the west instantly in a split second blink of an eye it was gone. where it had stopped and then took off the clouds were gone like a circle as if the heat of it had burned them away and you could see the clear sky. now this is the weird part, i don't remember going back across the road, getting in the van, the rest of the trip. i don't remember ever telling anyone about it or talking about it with my dad or aunt. 20 some years later i was visiting my aunt and asked her to describe her memory of the event without saying what i remembered. she told it exactly like i just did here and when i asked my dad he said the exact same thing. even my cousin remembers it this way and he only watched from the window of the van. i have seen several t.V programs that reenacted this type of sighting by other people and it's described like what i saw. this thing was huge, it couldn't be man made, it had to be a thousand feet wide at least, it was at least 10 or more miles from us and was 10 times the size of the full moon. i always wondered if any other travelers or forest rangers or maybe someone living nearby also saw it. if you were on that hiway that night you couldn't have missed it.
content.summary: Very large very bright ball of light moving slowly in our direction with beam shining down on forest below

content.detailedDescription: On the night of june 14, 2015, shortly after 10:30, i shut off the tv and, as i often do, walked outside my townhouse to peer at the night sky before retiring to bed.  i walked out into the drive (which faces east) and was admiring the stars when a bright light appeared approximately 5-10 degrees off the vertical axis to the east/northeast.  as i looked at the light it grew extremely bright much like a strobe light or old-fashioned flash bulb which illuminated the entire area.  the object dimmed just as quickly and moved south for perhaps 2 degrees as it grew progressively dimmer and became a rather distinctive round shape which grew fainter and fainter before disappearing entirely.
content.summary: Bright object appeared, strobbed, then moved to south becoming distinctly disc shaped before disolving and disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: This/these event(s) take place in the skies above the bronx, new york, and in the bronx park between e gun hill road to the south and e 233rd. st. to the north, and between willett avenue to the east and the bronx park to the west. the sighting which i am reporting here for the first time in detail, occurred during the summer of 1985, one day before i was to move from the bronx, new york to san antonio, texas with both of my parents.  school had just let out for the year and my friends and i were saying our goodbyes and throwing a baseball around in the bronx park, across the street from the six-story apartment building in which we lived.  there were about five of us kids throwing "grounders & pop-ups" to each other, while several of our parents stood by talking and just hanging out.  my parents, and four other adults were there.  five of them (my parents included) stood talking near the street, while a friend's mother sat at "the monument", an approximately 15-20 foot tall obelisk-like stone structure with a 6 sided base facing the park.  across from "the monument" is "the horseshoe", a stone entryway in the shape of its namesake, with stone steps leading down to another level of the park below street level.  going after a "pop-up", i raised my glove and eyes skyward (south east) and noticed "heat-lightning" flashing just over my building's rooftop.  catching the ball, i pointed this out to my friends who were amazed to see it as well.  what struck me as odd was that it was a nice evening with no clouds, and that the flashes of light were only above and just behind, the rooftop.  there was no thunder, only light.  no lightning bolts or streaks, just massive flashes of light, and only above and behind my building's rooftop.  the light spread over a great area, but nowhere else in the sky was this happening.  this occurred for several long minutes during which time the flashes would stop and start, but then as kids will do, we went back to playing catch.  i noticed after a little while that it seemed to have stopped... then i saw it.  from behind the building an object moved very slowly over the rooftop about 50-100 feet above it, and coming in our direction it slowly descended from the six-story height of the building, down over the park and our heads, to about a third-story height (approximately 60 feet or so).  as it slowly passed over head i saw what i could only describe as a "flying-tank".  everyone (and everything) was silent then.  our parents, us kids, the craft... all silent.  then it passed over "the horseshoe" and hovered for a minute or so -which felt like forever!  the lower level of the park sits about 20 feet, more or less, lower than street level.  leading down from "the horseshoe", the stone steps bring you to a paved path running north-south, and just below the path there is a depression in a clearing approximately 100-150' feet in diameter, next to a fenced in playground area.  into this depression it descended.  the craft appeared dark grey and black in the night sky, illuminated by the street lamps nearby, with many shapes (squares/rectangles/tube-like structures) visible along the bottom and sides.  there were no particular patterns visible, and it appeared to be made from giant lego blocks.  there were no visible lights or windows, just this huge, dark, hulking, silent craft.  as it descended, it dipped below the treetops and into the clearing where we would play baseball.  the craft now below us, the field erupted in white light, as though lit by the lights at yankee stadium.  lit from beneath, every tree seamed to cast shadows straight up into the night sky as the explosion of light weaved through them.  i believe that the craft touched down at this point (though admittedly, the craft was obscured at this point, by blinding light), because there was no movement by the shadows ie. the scene appeared static.  we amazed at this for a minute or so... that was all we could stand.  my friends and i shared the briefest of glances, as well as the unspoken "we've gotta see this!" and ran for "the horseshoe" to go down and have a look.  "nooooooo!!!!!!!!!!!!"  the scream pierced the night and stabbed right through me.  my friend's mother, sitting at "the monument", screamed as though she were being ripped apart -it was blood-curdling!  we froze in place transfixed by her warning.  just then the light went off like a switch and slowly the craft ascended to about ten or fifteen feet above tree level, hovered there for a moment, then began to wobble?, gyrate?  it was like a toy spinning top as it looses its speed and begins to wobble just before it comes crashing down.  now imagine that... but upside down.  it made three complete counter-clockwise gyrations then shot off in a "right dog-leg" following the park's path first one block north, then another thirteen blocks and beyond to the northeast at incredible speed.  we [kids] ran then, regardless of any protests the one block to the north, and coming around the bend in the park could see (it's a straight shot), beyond the thirteen blocks that signaled the end of the bronx park... "heat-lighting" in the night sky.  walking back to our block, all of my friends were extremely excited saying,"what was that!?! and,"did you see that!?!  my walk back was in silence.  like them, i too did not know what it was.  like them, i too witnessed it; however, unlike them (to the best of my knowledge) i am the only one who had seen it before.  in 1979 at the age of eleven, just six blocks down and two blocks over from where this sighting took place, on a bright sunny afternoon a "flying-tank" (dubbed this from the army men toys i played with as a child -granade throwing, bazooka firing, flame-thrower toting, radio operating, prone position shooting army men, and yes... tanks! my favorite! plenty of war flicks with my pop too!) which was to me at the time, the biggest thing my young mind could conceive of.  it followed me, floating just overhead in complete silence, for over half a block as i walked towards my two brothers and a bunch of friends playing in the street.  it cut a big black square hole in the clear blue sky.  as i approached them i turned and pointed,"look" i said, but it was gone.  this occurred the day before my family moved from there, to the building across from the bronx park -but i digress.  upon returning to "the monument" i asked my friend's mother, whom was so close to my family that we called her my aunt,"why did you screem?  why didn't you let us go look at it?"  to which she replied,"look at what?  i didn't screem, what are you talking about?  go play."  my own parents either refuse to face or truly don't recall, the incident.  my best friend growing up was there that night, we lost touch shortly after i moved away, but in 2011 i tracked him down and like my parents he too either refuses to face what really happened that night in 1985 or doesn't remember it.  for me, now at the thirty-year anniversary of the event, my recollection is as clear as if it happened today.  there is so much more, missing time, a scoop mark, bits and pieces that i can no longer ignore... a long history hidden in my head; yet, for all that i suspect i've been through, this is the first time i reach out to seek answers for what i have seen and what i have experienced.  why did it appear each time i moved?  why is it that i am the only one who remembers this?  is this their way of saying we always know where you are?  another thing that has just now taken me aback is that, using google earth to verify landmark directions, i found what looks like a "white tree" where i believe this craft landed, where all others trees throughout the entire park are green only.  anyway, i believe this is a good first step.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Same craft i saw at age 11 at 213th. st. & wiillett ave. 2nd sighting age 17 at 219th. st. bronx blvd. n.Y.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my balcony having a cup of coffee when i noticed this incredible orb hovering above the tree just behind my back yard. the object caught my eye immediately as it was very low not more than 10 feet above the tree top.  it was also hovering still above the tree which is very unusual. it stayed in this hovering position swaying back and forth for about a minute before ascending upward.  the object flew upward and picked up speed. then surprisingly it changed direction and started flying downward back towards the tree and telephone wires. at this point i knew the object was not conventional and was demonstrating controlled movements.  the object appeared to be the size of a beach ball or basketball. i recorded the entire event on my sony hx3-nx3 camcorder. i didn't have time to set up the tripod however the recording is fairly stable given the circumstances. this video covers the first 4 minutes of the capture of the orb hovering above the tree, flying upward, then flying downward before i turned off the camera content with the capture.

thank you for your time and analysis.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Incredible plasma orb hovering over tree in my backyard

content.detailedDescription:
I can not report this without using profanity because it was profanity which made me notice the object (when one of my fellow soldiers screamed at the top of his lungs).

i served in the army/ng for eight years. i did communications & was trained at the gte resident school at fort gordon ga (now the verizon resident school). our first five days of training was all in the class room and then they started taking us out to an area they called the "ota". ota stood for "outside training area"; the ota was not outside. it was in what used to be a helicopter hanger because the school had previously been for helicopter mechanics. the ota used to be outside but when they moved it - they kept the name. that's the army for you. after we spent a few weeks training in the "ota" learning how to operate gte's "mobile subscriber equipment" under the guidance of two civilian (but prior military) instructors - we moved into an area which actually was outside, but they didn't call it the "outside training area", it was simply called "the antenna field". you can see this field in the movie "heartbreak ridge" with clint eastwood - they shot part of the movie there at what was then housing for mi. or if you want precise longitude and lattidude coordinates, here it is: 33°24'15.53"n 82° 8'18.27"w fort gordon is a really beautiful base, it's kind of nestled in the middle of the woods in georgia and during the weekends when we'd get time off i would sometimes go hiking far off into the hills - it was absolutely beautiful. the air force uses the base also for communications training and on a few of my expeditions on the base i ended up finding huge satellite dishes which i never learned anything about, i just saw them. there was also a lot of military intelligence at gordon (i assume there still is) and it used to crack me up that these dudes thought they were "hiding" - maybe they were blending in with the civilian population but they stuck out like a sore thumb on a military base. they're the only ones on the base with long hair and hawaiian shirts - how much more obvious can you get!? i have so many stories from my time at fort gordon including the time i got so drunk at the nco club that i threw up in the taxi on the way back to the barracks; got kicked out of the taxi and had to walk back - i didn't even know which way was up and didn't think i'd make it back. somehow i did. then there's the story about drill sergeant "n". it was a monday morning and there had been rumors that a soldier had been killed in an accident over the weekend. we all thought that it was a soldier in training from a different battalion, but around 8am our entire company was called into a "horse shoe" formation and introduced to the family of drill sergeant lisa lorrain "n". they told us she had been killed in a car accident and the entire company broke into tears. i never thought i'd see a drill sergeant cry but they all did. and we weren't even given time to grieve - we marched from that formation straight to school and were told to "maintain your military bearing" and continue forward with training as if nothing had happened. they told us the same thing at her memorial service - "maintain your military bearing... you know that if drill sergeant "n" saw you crying right now she'd have you on the ground in the front leaning rest position". but then they did the roll call. the command sergeant major called out the names of all drill sergeants in the company - each one replied. then he called out the name "drill sergeant "n""..... silence. "drill sergeant "n"".......... again, silence. "drill sergeant.... "n"" and then we heard one solitary bugle in the back of the room playing taps. i'd done well to maintain my military bearing up till that point but i f**king lost it. so did our other drill sergeant who had told us to "maintain your military bearing". after the ceremony the entire class was formed up (into a formation) outside and marched in silence to school. we were given "route step march" which means stay in formation but you can just walk - and we cried all the way to school. then sat in class crying and telling stories about drill sergeant "n". a few days later we were doing pt in the morning and our other drill sergeant marched us to the training field with the same cadence that drill sergeant "n" used to always march us with: "when i go... go down town.... don't you kick my dog around...." we got through two or three verses and the drill sergeants voice cracked. he stopped - we walked in silence the rest of the way fighting back tears. there was one other particular day in which is was also hard to maintain our "military bearing". we were learning to install a type of antenna called a "chu" antenna. i never found out what "chu" stands for but i spent eight years installing them. we were almost done with our installation on one night - it was around 8pm and dark outside but this big field had large powerful lights going all the way around it so we had plenty of light, but could still see the stars. it takes 3 soldiers to install one antenna and we had several groups with several antennas scattered around the field (about 30 soldier/students and 2 civilian instructors - employees of general dynamics). so we were almost done when i heard pvt shaw (standing to my right) screaming at the top of his lungs "look at that f**king ufo!!!!!". believe it or not, my first thought was "i can't believe he's using that kind of language around our civilian instructors - so much for military bearing" and then it registered in my brain what he'd actually said. so i looked up and saw a huge... very bright light; moving at speeds that would be impossible in any conventional aircraft i know of and making no sound at all. it was flying directly over my head. i got yelled at by one of our civilian instructors for looking at it (actually for taking my eyes off the antenna). he yelled "mcphalen!!! pay attention to what your doing!!!". so i looked back down just long enough to lock my cable anchor back into place (literally a split second; faster than it takes you to read the words "down;up") and when i looked back up the thing was gone. i spent the next two weeks looking at the sky wondering what that thing was or if i'd ever see it again. and nobody wanted to talk about it - the guy that yelled "look at that f***ing ufo" suddenly changed his story and started saying it was a "weather balloon" (i guess he likes getting promoted). nobody talked to me after the incident - i never had any "men in black" suits show up at the barracks and tell me look into a flashy shiney thing or tell me not to talk about what i saw. so i reported it to mufon (13 years later) and have been talking about it ever since it happened. during the nights that followed i spent a lot of time thinking about what i'd seen & watching the skies. on one occasion we were working on a different type of antenna - much larger and much more dangerous but we had fewer of them and only two groups got to train at a time. so every couple of nights our group (one of three) would sit it out in a large field tent for the whole training night! eight hours, we'd just sit and watch movies (most crappy) and eat either chinese food or pizza. the chinese food sucked; the pizza was awesome - but i was still going outside every few hours just too look up at the sky (after getting bored with the horrible movies). i was looking up and saw what looked like a bright star where it didn't belong - in the middle of the orion constellation. i know the constellations pretty well, i'm a member of friends of the observatory (griffith) and have been into astronomy since i was a kid; i even have star charts and a droid app for astronomy. but anyway (tmi)... i knew that this "star" didn't belong in that spot. i also knew that it wasn't venus because it wasn't in the right place / right time. so i gauged it's position in the sky by leaning against the guard rail to lock in my own position and see where it sat across the telephone wires. over the hours i watched orion move across the sky, but this thing never moved. toward the end of the night orion was already on the horizon - and this thing was still in the same spot. if it had been a planet it would have been moving faster than the stars - not slower or no movement at all. so about an hour before the class was over - i went back outside again to look at this thing again (it was there for about 5 hours, just sitting there in the sky). even if it was a ufo... how long can you stare at a ufo that's not doing anything? so i'd go back inside; eat pizza; watch movies; go back outside - it's still sitting there; go back inside etc. but close to the end i went out and the thing was gone but there were about 7 or 8 black hawk helicopters flying around the area where it had previously been (it wasn't even there any more) but not passing through the space where the thing had been sitting. and the helicopters never went anywhere near it while it was in the sky.... kinda weird. a few nights after that - same type of situation with the sky; except it was a weekend. there was no training and i was sitting outside the px (33°25'28.03"n 82° 8'18.04"w) having a beer and a slice of pizza and reading by myself. every now and then i'd put the book down and look up at the sky. i eventually noticed an object similar to the other one (probably took me a little longer to spot it because i'd already had a few beers by this point). i don't remember if it was in the middle of orion, i was a bit tipsy and didn't bother to take note of it's precise location. but there it was - just sitting there; not moving; in just about the same area of sky. i sat there in that spot reading for probably five hours and that thing sat there in the sky for longer than that because eventually i literally got bored with it - so i finished my book; beer & pizza; went back to the barracks and went to sleep. never saw it again. 

this happened 13 years ago and i still think about it almost every single day. i don't think there's a single day that goes by that i don't look up at the sky at least once. the event did not scare me at all but filled me with wonder and awe. one interesting fact that i have discovered recently (today in fact) is that at some point in time between my sighting and present day, the nsa opened up a facility roughly two miles to the west of where we had this sighting (a very interesting; curved building). it is clearly visible on google earth and is even labeled as an nsa facility. to the best of my knowledge this facility wasn't there in 1999. the object came from the west of where i was standing; just minutes ago i was exploring the area to the west of where we had our sighting and there appears to be a hanger of some sort nestled deep in the woods - directly to the west of where the sighting occurred and almost exactly south of the nsa facility (but slightly to the east). it's definitely worth a look if you have google earth, some of the surrounding terrain appears to have been digitally manipulated (area 51 is clearer on google earth than some of the areas surrounding thomas lake which is also to the west of where the sighting occured). 

unfortunately we were not allowed to take cameras into the area in which we were training because the equipment we were working on was classified (that's not always as interesting as it sounds - it's just communications equipment). but i have attached one image from google maps which has a letter "x" marking the exact location where i was standing at the time of the sighting. i also have pictures of my entire training class and our instructors standing in front of the gte resident school (as it was called at that time - i think it's now called the "verizon resident school) but it would probably be inappropriate to upload that image.
content.summary: While training i saw a very bright object moving at high speed; low altitude; made no noise; witnessed by 16 other soldiers.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my bedroom, at my desk on my computer, looking at twitter, and posting a list of videogames that i want to play, because the e3 2015 event was going on, and everyone was excited about all the new videogames that are coming out.

then all of the sudden, i thought a moth flew into my screen, and landed on my keyboard. so i grabbed some toilet paper from a shelf under my desk, and tried to grab it and kill it. 
but when i tried to crush it, it felt kind of hard, and solid, and thicker than a moth.

so i opened up the tissue and looked at it.
and it turns out to be an object that looks like a piece of old dried skin.
it kind of looks like a pork-rind that has been half fried, or a piece of human skin about 1.5 inches in diameter. i have no idea what it is.
i was sitting there for 10 minutes staring at it, trying to figure out what it was.

and then i told my mom to come look at it, and asked her "what the hell is this?", and told her what happened.
she said it might be some food that you ate, that fell on the keyboard.
but i haven't had any fried-pork, or fried-chicken, or any type of fried skin type of food in months. i was on my computer all day yesterday, and today, and i would've noticed if there was a gigantic piece of skin on my keyboard.

i then went into the kitchen, and grabbed a pair of plastic gloves, a ziploc bag, and a jar, and then i put the object into the bag, placed it in a jar, and put it into my refrigerator.

and here i am now, writing this report.

i did not have any food stuck to my ceiling.
the object is too heavy to have been blown by the wind.
it's almost like someone threw, or dropped the object at my computer monitor, or it just teleported out of thin air, between my face, and my computer monitor.

i would really like to get this artifact analyzed, so i could figure out what it is.
content.summary: Biologic material appear out of thin air.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed sleeping when my dogs started to go off like crazy the i herd a buzzing or like a hum sound coming from out side the i look out my kitchin window to see a lite wiz by only to here the sound a again then my dogs freekt out some moor then everything went to a weird quiet..
content.summary: Weird

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At the time of the sighting, i was grilling some hamburgers. when i noticed a red light just above the western horizon (~5°) at first i thought it was a spark and/or flare from a illegal firework because it fell from the sky glowing red. but as i continue to observe it moved independently of the wind and  appeared to grow larger and come closer to my location. at such time i went inside to get a friend to see the object. by the time we got outside the object was just hovering high off the horizon (~25°). for a few minutes the object  just hovered with its light emissions shifting to a dark orange light and then it began to dim and move to the west above the ortega mountain rage. it appeared to be only a few hundred feet above the mountain. then it began dripping three red lights, this last for no more than two minutes. and soon afterwards the craft moved quickly to the horizon and change in color to blue-white light and disappear from view.
content.summary: The craft was star like but had an erratic flight path. starting low in the horizon and rose quickly, and hovered for a few minutes growing in brightness .

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking video of sky which i do always.Than i analize my videos.So this is 1 of my those footages.It was really hard to catch when i analized but i just see a little dot and i focused ob it
content.summary: It was my best footage and it was pyramid ufo
Dark shape far in horizon ... not to be seen with naked eyes .. only by cam
content.locationName: São Bernardo do Campo, São Paulo

content.detailedDescription: Both my wife and i where sitting in our front yard relaxing when we saw a bright almost neon blue color light exploding and launching an object in a vertical path leaveing a trail of light. after we both just looked at eachother in aww. to this day niether of us can say for sure what we think it is.
content.summary: Bright blue light exploded sending an object in a vertical direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my property in the aquarius mountains south of interstate 40 at 42 hundred ft. elevation trying to capture lightning in the distance at dusk. using a three second shutter speed with the lens fully zoomed out and pausing about two seconds between shots i took a series of seven pictures each with the mysterious lights in them. the camera was on a tripod and was never repositioned for the entire series. the lights had to have been blinking for there not to be a trail using a three second exposure. the lights were not observed while taking the pictures; only after loading them on my computer. there is a pattern to the lights across the seven pictures. zooming in on the lights on my computer they appear rectangular.
content.summary: Series of photos each with about 3 sec shutter speed.

content.detailedDescription: It's friday may 29, 2015 around 10 am  and my tennis partner and i are playing singles at cal dickson tennis center in south tampa.  we are the only ones there.  it's 3 to 3 in the second set, add out and i'm serving from north to south.  i'm serving a second serve.  my service toss is in an area directly above my head as i face west.  i tilt my head up as i look at the area in the sky where i want to toss the ball into.  i look up an toss the ball and stop.  directly in the area that i'm tossing the ball i see a object every high in the sky reflecting the light of the sun.  i say to my partner look at that and point.  he can't see it.  so i go over to his side of the court next to him and point at the object in the sky.  it's stationary and metallic reflecting the light from the sun, which at 10am is south east.  he sees it and we stare transfixed.  he sees a second similar object higher in the sky that i can't see. the object stayed in this area for around 5 or more minutes and then either left or disappeared.  we just couldn't see it anymore. cal dickson tennis center is around six miles north of u.S. central command macdill air force base in south tampa. my partner and i resumed playing tennis and shortly thereafter a military helicopter, (long and silver), appeared in the sky near where the object was that we sighted, but lower.  the helicopter stayed stationary in the sky till around 11am.  and numerous military large aircraft with contrails appeared patrolling flying very high in the sky near where the object was sighted.  these aircraft were many times higher in the sky than the helicopter. my partner and i have been playing tennis at the cal dickson tennis center three times a week on weekday mornings for over two years and are familiar with the aircraft flying over the area.  tampa internation airport is around five miles northwest of the cal dickson tennis center. occasionally traffic, news and police helicopters appear over the area of the cal dickson tennis center.  but these helicopters are always east, southeast, northwest over land.  the unidentified flying object we saw was west of us out over the bay.
content.summary: Playing tennis on a friday morning may 29th.  i was serving and tossed the ball above my head an saw a ufo high in the sky reflecting light.

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging with friends in a backyard and saw the silver objects up in the sky. at first i thought they were balloons but they were really high up and started moving randomly and blinking in and out of view. they were not planes, blimps, helicopters or flares for sure because of the way they moved and blinked. hovering and then go upward, then downward diagonal descent, then up again, change directions, come to a full stop and hover, and sometimes circular movement.  i pointed them out to 4 people and they all thought it was something weird and unknown. it was a daytime sight on a sunny day. we observed them for about 1/2 hour until they faded out of sight. i caught them on video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three white-silver diamond objects hovering and fading in and out of view

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were at dale hollow lake enjoying the view of the stars provided by the clear rural skies. we have a boat on the lake and stargazing is one of our favorite activities. the area lies along the flight path of commercial jets & they are pretty common. once in a while we see tiny unblinking starlike objects moving from north to south or vice versa that we believe to be satellites. on this particular night, june 15 2015, sometime between 9 and 10 pm i was looking almost straight up at the constellation cygnus the swan. just to the northeast of the constellation i saw a moving unblinking light. not particularly bright or moving rapidly so if i had not been looking at the area i would probably have missed it. i pointed it out to my wife as a possible satellite. we watched together as it moved in a northwesterly direction. just a few seconds after first sight, it rapidly brightened to become the brightest object in the heavens. as bright or brighter than the full moon. a very unusual blue white hue like an electrical arc welder or the bluish light of an led bulb. i had the impression of a spotlight pointing directly at us. it remained bright for just a couple of seconds, the faded to its former level of brightness. it continued on the same course as before, then faded from view. i have some experience star gazing and one explanation i can think of is a meteor that skipped off the upper atmosphere, becoming briefly bright and then continuing back out of the atmosphere and fading. i've seen many meteors, including some that appear to be aflame. i must say that the level of brightness and the unusual blue white color make that explanation unsatisfactory to me. the other explanation is a commercial jet briefly turning on its landing lights. again, the extreme altitude it would have been flying would, i believe, have made the light much dimmer, and again the blue white shade was so unusual as to make this explanation unsatisfactory to me also. also, the light never blinked like a typical commercial aircraft.
content.summary: Satellite like illuminated object moving slowly from se to nw almost verticallly above suddenly became intense blue white & by far brightest object in the sky then faded and continued movement until fading from sighte

content.detailedDescription:
Ii  was  in  the  winter  months  of  1958.  my  friend  and  i  had

driven  down  the  dirt  lane  to  his  farmhouse  some 80 rods  back

in   the  field.  the  ground  had  been  frozen,  thawed,  driven

on  and  refrozen.  it  was  full  of  ruts.  the  car  could  only

travel  about  2  or  3  miles  an  hour.  as  we  were  going  back

up the  driveway  to  the  east,  perhaps 10 or 15%  of  the  drive

we  suddenly  saw  a  dark  saucer-shaped  object  in  the sky.  it  

had  small  lights  all  around  it.  we  did not  hear  any  noise.  

it may have  hovered  and  moved  along  with  us  as  we  moved  up  

the drive.  it  did  not  seem  that  we  became  closer  to  it.  all  

of a  sudden  it  was  gone.  we  did not  see  it  leave.  it  had  

been  about  two  to  three  telephone  poles  high  in the sky, to  

the left or  north  side  of the driveway.  we  do  not  think  that  

we  were abducted.  there  did  seem  to  be  a  slight  time  delay  

of  the  expected  time  of  our  arrival  at  the  cafe  where  we 

expected to  meet  our  friends.  they  had  all  gone  home.  there 

were still townspeople  in  the  cafe.  

we  did  not  know  what  we  had seen.

i  thought  it  might  have been  a  weather  balloon.  later  realized

that  it  was not.  we  did  not  tell  anyone  about  it.  we  didn't

want  others  to  think  that  we  were  crazy.  we didn't  drink

or  do  drugs.
content.summary: My  friend  and  i  saw  a  saucer  shaped  object  in  the  sky  over  his  farm, rudd,  ia.  it  had  lilghts  all  around  it.  we  heard  no  noise.

content.detailedDescription: While at work on an oil/gas location, i saw a set of 3 lights/craft in a pyramid shape with another of same size, shape and color travelling in an elliptical pattern underneath the other 3.  i was looking over a piece of equipment set out about 200' and standing 60' high, the objects were over the top of it but at a distance undetermined from the equipment and at an elevation that put it above the equipment if directly over the top would have been 20 to 30' above.  i was wearing polarized safety glasses.  i at first thought them to be birds but realized quickly that they were not moving, except for the one that continued to go in circles under the other 3.  i had a radio and called to other people on location to see if they could see them, none of them could see them.  i walked over to them and none of them were wearing sunglasses.  i pointed at the objects and described what i was seeing, still none of them could see them.  i took my glasses off and gave them to one of the other people there and pointed out what i was seeing.  with the naked eye, i could only really see just a small flash as the sun reflected off of them when they would move slightly and the one doing circles, could only see when it came around closer to us in direction and then could not see it on the back side of the circle.  the guy i gave my glasses to could still not see them, i took the glasses back and as they started to ridicule me i saw the object at the top of the triangle shape come down to the one doing circles and go around it in a circle but top to bottom around the other one.  it then shot back into formation and the one doing the circles the entire time then formed up so the formation took on a diamond shape.  they appeared to shudder for a moment then shot off to the west faster than any aircraft could have from a hover position.  about 5 minutes later a jet entered the area along the same track that the objects had moved off in.  the jet was higher than i normally see commercial aircraft and can only suspect it was military in nature.  i did not see the objects the rest of the day and took quite a bit of joking from the rest of the crew.  i laughed it off with them, but inside, felt and still feel that i had seen something and when watching them i can honestly say after reflection that i had no feelings at all, like my mind was just blank.  i know i saw them, i am not crazy.  i wish i had a camera on me, but there is no evidence other than my statement.
content.summary: Three lights in a triangle formation with one in a continuous elliptical pattern underneath, then all shot off quickly

content.detailedDescription: At 515am i started  my  drive  to work on  lummi reservation at silver reef casino. as i ready to leave my driveway. i noticed a  bright light coming  form the  east. i was  stopped  in my drive way. the  object stooped  over  head and  a  light came  over  head. i took off on my  motorcycle to the west . it seemed  to follow me. i turned  north and  the  object stayed with me  it seemed. the  light  stayed on me as  i turned   to the  west again and  increased speed to 50mph the  light  and  object stay with me. i increased  my  speed  to 70mph and  it stayed  with me till i turned  onto the  driveway at work. as i stoped  at work parking  lot ..It  was  gone...  no noise  i could hear....Traingle  shaped....Then it  was  gone. no ill effects.....
content.summary: Traingle with white  light

content.detailedDescription: It was hovering over the river or the gas company it stayed there for about 10 to 15 min. then 3 more came from the north. the three that came took turns to go into the cloud then the 4 one went into the cloud in the same spot.
content.summary: I was over the schuylkill river or that gas plant in south philadelphia.

content.detailedDescription: I was at approximately 2000 ft elevation when i and 2 others saw a jumbo jet with 3 army helicopters following it, and 2 white orbs directly behind it (between jet and helicopters), they appeared to be at maximum 10,000 foot elevation, traveling from west to east, observed for less than 2 minutes until out of view range.
content.summary: Jumbo jet with 2 orbs following

content.detailedDescription: On june 7th i noticed a change in the color outside and looked outside and saw this cloud. only one around. it didnt look right so my wife and i took pics. later i reviewed the pics and noticed all these objects in a couple of them. at the time they were not noticed by the naked eye. no sound or anything unusual except the cloud itself. there is just alot happening in a couple of pics. all were taken within seconds of each other. the cloud moved over slowly then was gone. no rain or wind was around at the time.
content.summary: Noticed cloud and took pics and didn't see anything at time until i reviewed them later. the light outside just changed to an unusual color is what got my attention.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking outside for a sky visual, i saw a bright, noiseless, red-orange orb pass directly overhead near the zenith headed east. i ran to grab the camera. 

by the time i retrieved my camera, the object was approximately 40-degrees up, then moved to about 35-degrees. the object's speed looked constant. then it moved downward or further east behind trees.

while reviewing the images at high resolution, i noticed a shape change with a bulge like a smaller orb was attached or associated it (see image). this visual could be caused by tumbling. the direction of travel was plotted from locations of serial shots.  also noticed was a blue cast to a small portion of the orb's upper right side. the increase in brightness/intensity next to the orb can be tested accurately with the photoshop eyedropper.

in dsc2211, there is also a shift of the orb's color to the blue end.

we live under an east to west flightpath and about 3-miles from an airforce base to the south. the west to east commercial path is to the south several miles away.  any objects tend to stand out when they move in the -wrong- direction, have no flashing lights, landing lights, or faa-required green and red wing tip lights.

during this time, i did not notice any air traffic.  this is not the first time.  

excitement always accompanies a sighting. this was no exception.
content.summary: Observe a red-orange orb quietly passing overhead headed east, then north on nov. 11, 2014.

content.detailedDescription:
I was doing my usual ufo hunting from my bedroom window , and filmed a few planes and grumbling about the fact "they" were not showing up yet, and could they just do it now because it's late, and i want something spectacular. bright. something i can prove is a ufo. 

as soon as i had mumbled my dissatisfaction i spotted a bright light hovering in the distance. 

the bright light would pulsate then brighten into a magnificent light! yellowy orange white. the object started to blink out but as it did another dark object flew in from the north to north-east and hovered next to the dying ufo light. 

the second object brightened it's lights so bright it looked like the moon! it was copying the first ufo in it's sequence of light display but much brighter than the one before it did. 

i was remarking about how bright it was when they ufo responded with a pop sound and a red light! 

this went on for 7 mins. just hovering there. i was amazed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Formation of hovering ufo  lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Uso, approx. 1972 off mass. coast about 80 miles out,off the shelf,while traveling on surface in a diesel sub heading approx n. i was one of the lookouts on starboard side (right) in my sweep of my zone spotted a bright white light on surface behind us, in the time it took to notify the officer of the deck i saw that it was closing rapidly, first siting approx. 10 miles off, closed within a minute and slowed to our speed (12 knots)
and remained positioned off our starboard side for about 15 minutes at roughly 50 ft away. when first sighted our sonar crew was notified and given its direction, nothing was heard. while it was incoming ,while it was stopped , or when it left us.
as stated it marked time with us for about 15 min while the capt and officer observed and capt questioned sonar operator. our guys heard nothing then just like it came it left, from 12 knots it accelerated to over 60 knots straight north for a mile then 45 right to ne and gone from view within a min. any normal submerged object accelerating that fast would have left a major disturbance in the water, no disturbance no noise of engines,screws,or caterpillar drive like in red october nothing at all.
our boat did carry mk 45 nuke torpedoes at that time.
after it had gone the officer of the deck asked the capt how to enter this in the log book. the capt said enter what, you saw nothing to put in a log.
the ood said understood sir.
nothing was said to myself or the other lookout about it.
during the event it looked like someone shining a bright spotlight at surface, no real idea of size.
also no disturbance of surface of ocean coming or going.
content.summary: 1 of many sitings,on bridge of deisel sub heading aprox n contact was submerged closed fast marked time off side 50 ft away for 15 min then left fast n then ne

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were taking pictures of the rocky mnts. when a rainbow appeared behind us . so i swung around and took 4 or 5 pictures quickly ,the shooting speed and time is attached . when i put the pictures on my lap top i noticed the small craft seemingly to be circling the rainbow the pictures were taken just seconds apart and the craft is moving all over ? not one of the three people staring at this rainbow saw anything !!!    ps. i included a photograph from the mnt. direction which was nw. the rainbow was in the  se.
content.summary: Shooting pictures of a rainbow in the foothills ,when i blew them up i discovered their was a disc flying around the pics.?

content.detailedDescription:
13 june, 2015 just after 9:00 pm driving north on route 15 after leaving "snow's corner" gas station in orrington, maine.

100 to 200 yards from my turn off to the right, just before the orrington-brewer town-line, i saw a bright teal object slightly above the trees to the north-northeast going slightly above the tree tops, then dipping below with some lateral motion back and forth as it did. it was "triangular" but had a round shape with smaller circles underneath.
it illuminated a teal color (not unlike the background of this text field) seemingly from within as the surface "glowed" teal, with black features on it. at one point it tipped slightly away and i could see the bottom of the object. lastly, it went below the trees one last time and i did not see it again.

this sighting lasted less than one minute, but more probably less than 30 seconds. 

i pulled over in my truck and tried to see it from the next road down from mine but could not. 
i then parked my truck and went inside to grab my 10x50 magnification binoculars and ran back to route 15 and walked down to the train-tracks that go across route 15 in brewer, paralleling the river - but the object was no longer visible. 
i though i might find some people outside using a drone of some sort, but there was no one outside that i saw. there was also no differentiation in color scheme of the lights to indicate a bow/stern or port/starboard configuration for night flying. 

at this time i called a family member to tell them what i'd seen and the call was made at 9:28 pm per the phone's history. 

[note]:

[removed personal info/dr/cms]



this object was clearly not a conventional aircraft and moved very quickly back-and-forth and up-and-down. the color was almost as bizarre as the behavior itself.

[picture]:

it repeated the "1" > "2" steps several times, and the "3" > "4" was it disappearing out of view and below the tree line in that direction.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular teal ufo spotted north of route 15 from orrington-brewer town-line over the penobscot river between brewer and bangor, maine.

content.detailedDescription: We were in side waiting for diner watching tv when the next door neighbours yelled out there is something in the sky, so we all went out to check it out i was the youngest in the family of seven, any way it was a cigar like structure just hovering in the air a couple miles from us a few thousand feet up it was very large you could see it very clear every body was trying to say what it could be but it wasn't a plane or balloon we thought it might be part of a rocket it was the days when men were been sent to the moon but it just hovered there for ages so it couldn't have been that any way the local paper the daily telegraph had a picture on the front page a day or so later saying unexplained object in the sky last night and then it just seemed to get hushed up and we never heard or read any thing about it since it was in the very late 60s or early 70s the picture the paper took was in the dark but we were watching it when it was still light in till it got to dark to see it properly, and till this day even with all the new types of secrete aircraft i still can't tell you what it was.
content.summary: T he neigbors yelled over the fence to look in the sky so the whole family went out and watched it for ages it was in the local paper but i can,t find it now

content.detailedDescription: I was tobogganin at the back of our house in the middle of no ware when i observed a bright light hovering over the forest and would dissappear in the forest then rise it was or seemed it was aware of me then i was frightened
content.summary: Bright light searching for something or who knows what little bright light in the middle of no ware i knew the area well no milatary or helicopter would have been there call me

content.detailedDescription: I work for an airline in atlanta. i was outside on one of the gates when for some reason i looked straight up. there were two white ball looking objects floating directly over head.I looked at my fellow employee and said " what the .... is that?" they could not id them either. i ran and got a buddy of mine and before long there were about 5 or 6 of us looking at theses objects.They looked like white balloons kind of but did not act like balloons. they staid the same distance apart from each other and moved in the same direction together opposite of the clouds. one observer watched them go up in altitude and come back down. there is no telling how many people actually saw them. another witness said they say a small plane fly across and above the ramp area towards the objects and they disappeared.
content.summary: White sphere or disc with grey center. observed from directly below.
